name: Mockup Plus 1.08
short_description:
Focus on design, rather than tool.
For software companies, rapid development and quick updates are a winning formula in the software development industry.
Mockup Plus assists you as the best tool for quick prototype design.
It is simple, handy, sufficient and inspiring, making it easier for you to make publications and saving you lots of learning cost and time cost.
Now for $69 only, you can have a Professional Plus Edition of Mockup Plus, which provides you with a licenc e to use on 3 computers, unlimited duration, free UI components upgrades and our support services.
SIMPLE AND QUICK,ABUNDANT COMPONENT LIBRARY,SKETCH STYLE,REVIEW,SLIDE EXPORT

The best prototype design tool, it can quickly build desktop,web,mobile software prototype, and support sketch style.
summary: The best mockup design tool for agile develpopment
